## Credential Format

### Algorithmia

File: `algorithmia.json`

```json
{
  "apiKey": "Sua chave do Algorithmia API",
  "lang": "pt"
}
```

### Watson Natural Language Understanding

File: `watson-nlu.json`

```json
{
  "apikey": "...",
  "iam_apikey_description": "...",
  "iam_apikey_name": "Auto-generated service credentials",
  "iam_role_crn": "...",
  "iam_serviceid_crn": "...",
  "url": "https://..."
}
```
